title: The Lovers
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Two figures: a woman in striped and dotted dress reclining, with her right arm around shoulders of a man leaning over her; he kneels, with left elbow in her lap, right hand on his hip; low oval base.
name: Figure
